job_description: Assist in analyzing business processes, building dashboards, and generating insights using SQL, Python, and Excel. Collaborate with product and tech teams to support data-driven decisions.
Work with large datasets to build reports, identify trends, and support business stakeholders. Use SQL and Python for ETL and data modeling.
Support product managers in building roadmaps, writing user stories, and coordinating with engineers and designers. Analyze user data and feedback.
Help the Smith School analytics team build BI dashboards for student outcomes and enrollment trends. Use SQL and visualization tools.
Support consulting teams with process mapping, financial modeling, and client presentations. Work with Excel and PowerPoint extensively.
